sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { formValidation = new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl([Validators.required,Validators.minLength(3)]), age:new FormControl([Validators.required,Validators.min(20),Validators.max(40)]), Email:new FormControl([Validators.required,Validators.email]) } ) }
Registration Form
